name: Critical Path (itch) (g0dz4ll027)
description:
Critical Path is a project made by a group of 6 people for the course of Video Game Design in IPB. The main objective of this project was to combine all the knowledge aquired throughout the lessons and implement them in a practical work which, in this case, is a 3D game.

Bare in mind, the game was made in roughly 2 months and a lot of the mechanics and content is still in a very early stage of development. 

Key Features:

- Classic tower-defense game with increasingly difficult and chaotic waves;

- Fight waves of covid variants to win this war against the horrible pandemic;

- Choose a number exotic turrets to defend the immunity system;

- Various different threats to challenge you;

- Cartoony and unique visuals for you to  enjoy a cozy and fun environment.

The game was made in the Unity Engine.
